title: i-Envy by KISS Super Strong Hold Eyelash Adhesive, Waterproof Long-Lasting Strip Lash Glue, Natural-Looking Allergy & Latex Free with Brush Applicator (Clear)

all_images.alt: i-Envy by KISS Super Strong Hold Eyelash Adhesive, Waterproof Long-Lasting Strip Lash Glue, Natural-Looking Allergy & Latex Free with Brush Applicator (Clear)

raw_desc: 【STRONG & LASTING HOLD】 This eyelash adhesive boasts a formidable 48-hour hold, ensuring your lashes stay in place flawlessly. Its waterproof and sweatproof formula makes it perfect for all-day wear, regardless of the weather or activity. 【NATURAL-LOOKING LASHES】 Achieve diverse and natural-looking lash styles effortlessly. i-ENVY by Kiss offers various lash styles, catering to all your DIY lash look needs while ensuring a seamless and invisible bond. 【SAFE & GENTLE FORMULA】 Prioritizing your eye health, our lash glue is allergy-free and latex-free. Its ingredients are ophthalmologist tested and non-hypoallergenic, making it kind to even the most sensitive skin and contact lens friendly. 【EASY & PRECISE APPLICATION】 Designed with a brush-on applicator, this eyelash glue allows for a thin, precise glue line. The quick-drying formula ensures fast and efficient application, perfect for both beginners and professionals. 【VERSATILE LASH SOLUTION】 Ideal for both everyday wear and special occasions, this adhesive is perfect for anyone seeking a reliable, long-lasting, and skin-friendly eyelash solution. Its versatility makes it a must-have in your beauty arsenal.
